title: Brand New Super Luxury Apartment Unit A & B with Own Pool
details:
(LR-SA-AURA-U-A/B) Please Mention This Code When You Contact Us, So We Can Be Of Better Service to You.

Aura Residencies

*****Loan facilitated by the developers******

• Unit A - 3 Bedroom (1200 sqft) - Rs.55.5M to Rs.64.5M (3rd, 4th, 5th, 7th floor) with fully furnished / individual pool options.

• Unit B - 3 Bedroom (1200 sqft) - Rs.55.5M to Rs.64.5M (3rd, 4th, 5th, 7th floors) with fully furnished / individual pool options.

NOTE: Please not that this advertisement has been posted by a realestate agency and that this service is FREE OF CHARGE. And we at Leon Real Estates give you the assurance that you as a client who seeks a property to be purchased through us have no obligations in order to pay any fees to us.

Call us on 0094773302783 for further details & appointments.

We are at your service on 24X7.
